<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Parry and Riposte](/Feats.aspx?ID=6180) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=825" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 169 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Prerequisites**
Opportune Riposte

</column>

---

Your parries and finishers allow you to riposte with the slightest provocation. You can use Opportune Riposte against an enemy who fails at a Strike against you (not just critically fails), provided you have both damaged that creature with a [finisher](/Traits.aspx?ID=802) on your last turn and currently have a circumstance bonus to AC from the [parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=667) weapon trait, or [Extravagant Parry](/Feats.aspx?ID=6128).
name: Parry and Riposte
